name: @radui/core
description: Meta Design System used across Vidbase products.
author: Van Nguyen <thegoleffect@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: microbundle build --jsx React.createElement --external react --format modern,cjs -o dist --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json -i src/index.tsx
scripts.watch: microbundle watch --jsx React.createElement --external react --format modern,cjs -o dist --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json -i src/index.tsx
